texts.text: Patch 28 was a version of Wii U Edition released on October 27, 2017.[1] [edit]

1 Additions
2 Changes
3 Fixes
4 See also
5 References

Added the Stranger Things Skin Pack.
Added a time-limited Halloween Tumble arena, including specially themed layers.
Added the "Custom" game type to the Battle mini game with many new settings, including:
Enable choosing the number of lives per round that each player gets.
Enable choosing the number of rounds to play before the winner is selected.
Enable forcing map size.
A variety of different options to manage how players heal and how quickly they get hungry.
Added the "No Armor "item set to custom Battle games.
Added the "High Power" item set to custom Battle games.
Added the "Decayed" item set to custom Battle games where every item breaks after a few uses.
Added the "Food Central" item set to custom Battle games.
Food is only found in the center chests and equipment only in the outer chests.
Added the "Custom" game type to Tumble mini game with many new settings, including:
Enable choosing the number of lives per round that each player gets.
Enable choosing the number of layers and controlling the size of the layers.
Added fireworks as a usable weapon in custom Tumble games.
Added splash potions of levitation as a usable weapon in custom Tumble games.
Added "Spectator Participation" option to custom Tumble games.
Players can now spectate Battle and Tumble mini games as a parrot, vex, or floating head.

MCCE-2442 – Nether portals stopped spawning pigman
MCCE-3040 – World deletion bug
MCCE-5241 – Authors of completed book and quills
MCCE-5681 – Save options bug
MCCE-5770 – Observers are broken
MCCE-5774 – Observers no longer do not dectect mushrooms
MCCE-5790 – Observers do not detect moves of blocks
MCCE-5803 – World consistently crashes console
MCCE-5890 – Very laggy on some worlds
MCCE-5934 – Signs causing lag
MCCE-5971 – Chests up high not opening
MCCE-6047 – Game freezes when mining
